title: Leading cigarette brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2016 , by sales value
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Sales value in million GBP in the y axis.
The Sales value in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Month Sterling and lowest at Month Windsor.
The difference of Sales value in million GBP between the highest and lowest Month is 1049.4.

The Sales value in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Month Sterling and lowest at Month Windsor.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Sales value in million GBP in the y axis.
The Sales value in million GBP is highest at Month Sterling and lowest at Month Windsor.
Month Mayfair has the second highest value for Sales value in million GBP.
The highest Month Sterling has 1049.4 more Sales value in million GBP than the lowest Month Windsor.
Month Sterling is higher than any other Months with value 1511.3, followed by Mayfair, and Lambert and Butler. Down to Month Windsor with the lowest value 461.9.
The Sales value in million GBP has declined over the past 10 Months.
The Month Windsor tends to be 1.95 percent lower than average.
The Sales value in million GBP is 7753.7 if we add up values of all Months.
